com.craftar
Class CraftARItem

java.lang.Object
  com.craftar.CraftARItem

public class CraftARItem
extends java.lang.Object

Contains an item from a cloud search. The item contains information such as the matched image, the score, associated url, extra content, etc.

Returns true if the item is an Augmented Reality item.

getJson

public JSONObject getJson()
Get the raw JSON object. Use this if you have extended the object in your own proxy server. If you use this, please note that the JSON that your server returns must match the structure described in the CraftAR cloud recognition API

Returns:
The item's raw JSON data.

getBBox

public double[][] getBBox()
Gets the item's Bounding Box as a double[][]. The coordinates are expressed as [tlx,tly] [trx,try] [blx,bly] [brx,bry] where t=>top, b=>bottom, r=>right, l=>left, x=>x-coordinate, y=>y-coordinate.

Returns:
The item's Bounding Box.
